GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
media: tw686x: Fix memory leak in tw686x_video_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0597bcf774896a002edcc7934a9cdbb932b66702, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 704a84ccdbf19fdce9adfda0b936dfdcac52fa49. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: tw686x: Fix memory leak in tw686x_video_init
